p: Besides the fruits, a study on the heartwood of the species [ 19] identified benzophenone2,4,6,3′,5′-pentahydroxybenzophenone ( 35) and the xanthones 1,3,6,7-tetrahydroxyxanthone ( 36) and 1,3,5,7-tetrahydroxyxanthone ( 37) to have antioxidant activity [ 42] and LDL-c-oxidation-inhibitory activity, respectively; additionally, the biflavonoids GB-1a ( 38) and volkensiflavone ( 23) have shown antioxidant activity [ 84] and antitumoral activity [ 74], respectively. Table 3 and Figure 3 summarize the main compounds, the plant parts they have been extracted from, and their related activities.
